SNOBOL4SPRINTF(3) | CSNOBOL4B 2.2 | December 5, 2020

NAME

snobol4sprintf - numeric formatting

SYNOPSYS

-INCLUDE 'sprintf.sno'


        string = SPRINTF(format,value)

DESCRIPTION

SPRINTF() can be used to format INTEGER and REAL values.

SEE ALSO

snobol4(1), sprintf(3)

AUTHOR

Philip L. Budne
